Elcy se encuentra casada, tiene 2 hijos, y debido a que las condiciones económicas en su hogar se estaban deteriorando cada vez más, ha decidido montar su propio negocio de venta de helados aprovechando que en el sector no se encuentra un negocio de estos. Fue con unos ahorros que inició su negocio en el cual tiene experiencia de haber trabajado durante muchos años anteriormente, y debido al poco capital con el que fue montado, solo ha comprado los recursos necesarios y está ubicado en la sala de su casa. A pesar del poco capital con el que fue montado, gracias a la buena atención que ofrece, su negocio ha salido adelante y ahora cuenta con muy buenos clientes que le permiten generar ingresos con los que su familia tiene mejores condiciones económicas. Buscando poder ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y así poder aumentar sus ventas, Elcy busca un préstamo para realizar adecuaciones locativas en su negocio y poder separar la sala de su casa del negocio.

Elcy espera que su negocio le siga brindando la oportunidad de que sus 2 hijos accedan a una educación de mejor calidad y también la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida en el hogar. Su sueño es sacar su familia adelante y ofrecerles un futuro económico más próspero.
texts.en:
Elcy is married with two children, and, because the economic conditions in her house had been getting worse and worse, decided to open her own ice-cream store in order to take advantage of the fact that there are no other ice-cream stores in her area. She opened her store initially with some savings. She has several years worth of experience working in this field. Because of the small amount of capital with which it was funded, she only purchased the resources that were absolutely necessary and located the business within her home. In spite of the small amount of capital with which it was funded, thanks to the good service she offers, her business has succeeded and now has many good customers that allow her to generate an income with which her family has better economic conditions. Looking to offer better service to her customers and thereby increase her sales, Elcy is looking for a loan in order to renovate her place of business and separate the door of the business from the door of her house.

Elcy hopes that the business will continue to provide her two children with access to a better education and also the opportunity to have a better quality of life in their home. Her dream is for her family to succeed and to give them a better economic future.

loans.use: to renovate her place of business and to be able to separate the door of her house from that of her business.

loans.name: Dilcia Maritza

texts.es: Dilcia, tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo en el municipio de Omoa, Cortes. Ella es una persona reconocida en la comunidad y  tiene 6 años de haber establecido su propio negocio de pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios como arroz, frijoles, productos lácteos, embutidos, refrescos, jugos y otros abarrotes. Ya tiene su clientela establecida y atiende durante todo el día. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo a ODEF por 25,000 Lempiras, con el cual quiere surtir más la pulpería de productos alimenticios para cubrir la demanda e incrementar las ventas. Su plan es trabajar mucho para mantener su negocio estable y dar calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Dilcia is 35 years old and a single mother. She lives with her son in the town of Omoa, Cortes. Dilcia is a person who is recognized in her community. Six years ago, she established her own grocery business where she sells food products such as rice, beans, dairy goods, sausages, soft drinks, juices, and other items. Dilcia has an established clientele and attends to her customers throughout the entire day.

She is requesting her second loan from ODEF in the amount of 25,000 HNL. Dilcia will use the money to restock her grocery store with more food products so that she can keep up with demand and increase her sales. Her plan is to work hard so that she can maintain a stable business and provide a good quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy various food products for her store.

loans.name: Bismark

texts.en:
Bismark, who is single, lives in the Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya where he has owned and operated a green grocer for one year. He also earns a salary from the transport business as the driver of a three-wheeled vehicle.

Bismark learnt about Milango through a friend who invited him to the group, and he joined in order to access credit to improve his business operations. His main challenge is the delay in payment by customers, leading to bad debts.

Bismark is requesting a loan of 10650 Kenya shillings to buy wholesale vegetables to expand and increase his sale. His extra income will be added to his savings to improve his family's living standards. He aspires to expand and own a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy wholesale vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es: La Sra. Gabriela de 42 años de edad es divorciada y tiene 2 dependientes económicos, ella es una mujer trabajadora que se ha esforzado para salir adelante, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos y dulces. Sabe que tiene que solventar económicamente a su familia, porque quiere que sus hijos no tengan carencia alguna es por eso que con gran esfuerzo ha ido poco a poco dándose a conocer para que su negocio crezca. En esta ocasión Gabriela solicita de nuestra ayuda para la compra de mercancía para hacer crecer su negocio y brindarles a sus hijos lo que ellos se merecen.
texts.en:
Sra. Gabriela, age 42, is divorced and has two financial dependents. She is a hardworking woman who strives to get ahead. Gabriela sells clothing, shoes, and candy. She knows how to meet the financial needs of her family because she does not want her children to go without. For this reason and with great effort, she has gradually gained recognition so that her business can grow.

On this occasion, Gabriela is requesting assistance so that she can buy merchandise to grow her business and give her children what they deserve.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 33-year-old married man with four children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. Thirteen years ago, Moses realized that he needed to set up income-generating activities since he was going to be married and have children. Today, he operates a retail shop and a furniture workshop, the proceeds from which enable him to pay school fees for his children and buy land. His major hardship is price fluctuation.

Moses has requested this loan to buy sugar and salt to sell and timber for the workshop. He dreams of expanding his workshop and having a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy sugar and salt to resell and timber for his workshop.

loans.name: Dalias Group

texts.es: Adilene es parte del grupo llamado Dalias dice que le pusieron ese nombre por que en donde hace sus reuniones hay flores de dalias y son muy bonitas y por eso le pusieron ese nombre al grupo. Ella tiene  20  años y es soltera dice que  ella estudio una carrera técnica de cultora de belleza y en su casa dice que la gente de su comunidad va a cortarse el pelo hombres y mujeres y niños, también sabe hacer rayitos, manicure, pedicura, sabe arreglar novias, quinceañeras y hace muchas cosas mas. Platica que  desde hace mas de 2 años se dedica a tener su estética y que por las tardes noches vende hamburguesas afuera de su casa, dice que con este negocio tiene también 3 años y que emprendió sus negocios para mejorar su calidad de vida y ganar su propio dinero, ella vive con sus padres y contribuye con los gastos de la casa y les ayuda con los gastos de sus hermanos que estudian la primaria ya que no quiere que les falte nada y así puedan estudiar mejor. Dice que está  pidiendo un crédito a Visión Fund para la compra de carne, diferentes legumbres como jitomate, cebolla, chiles en vinagre, lechugas etc. Dice que el negocio lo puso fuera de su casa por que su mama tiene una tiendita y así le hacen también el gasto al comprarle los refrescos o aguas embotelladas. Ella esta agradecida por esta oportunidad de que  hayan confiado en ella para que le hagan un crédito y espera no quedar mal ya que es una gran ayuda el crédito para hacer crecer su negocio. Las otras integrantes del grupo se llaman Minerva, Hilda, Rosario y Norma ellas invirtieron su crédito en sus negocios como en una tienda de abarrotes, bordado de prendas artesanales, venta de antojitos mexicanos.
texts.en:
Adilene is part of the group called Dalias.  The name Dalias comes from the fact that the area where they gather has beautiful dahlias.  She is a single 20 year-old who studied in beauty school.  She says that the people of her hometown go to her to get their hair cut.  She also knows how to do highlights, manicures, pedicures, prepare brides, quinceaneras, and much more.  

She has been practicing her beauty business for the last two years and in the evenings she sells hamburgers outside of her home.  She started this business three years ago to improve her quality of life and to make her own money.  She lives with her parents and contributes to the expenses of her grade school brothers so they can have what they need and are able to focus on their studies. 

She is seeking a loan from Vision Fund to purchase meat and vegetables like tomatos, onions, pickled peppers, lettuce etc.  She says that she placed her food stand outside of her home because her mother has a little store where people purchase beverages or bottled water.  

She is grateful that they have trusted her with a loan and she does not expect to default as this is a great help in growing her business.  The other members of this group are Minerva, Hilda, Rosario, and Norma.  They invested their loans in businesses like a grocery store, handmade embroidered products, and mexican treats.

loans.use: to purchase hamburgers to sell.

loans.name: Hipolita Del Socorro

texts.es: Hipólita es originaria de la comarca Asidades de 52 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos, ella es comerciante, se dedica a vender en una pulpería de su propiedad productos de diario consumo desde hace 20 años. Ella inicia sus actividades solicitando préstamos en diversas instituciones para invertir en productos muy buscados por los clientes como granos básicos, aceite, leche, entre otros. Asi fue como puso su propio negocio ubicado en su casa y hasta la fecha dice que le ha ido bien. Para obtener un ingreso mas para su hogar vende cuajadas. Las expectativas que tiene para su negocio doña Hipólita es ampliarlo con nuevos productos para ofrecer a sus clientes variedad. Esta solicitando un crédito kiva para comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, gaseosas, jabón y golosinas. Productos que son muy vendidos en su venta y que ayudara a generar más ingresos por que tendrá inventario para ofrecer. Espera que  terminar de pagar este crédito solicitara otro para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y de esta manera su pulpería se diversifique.
texts.en: Hipólita is originally from the Asidades region. She is 52 years old, married with three children. She is a merchant, she works selling every-day products in a small store that she owns, and has done so for 20 years. She began by asking for loans from several institutions in order to invest in some of her best-selling products such as basic grains, oil, and milk, among others. This is how she created her own business located in her house and says that, since that day, it has gone very well. In order invest more in her home, she sells junkets. She has plans to increase the size of her business with new products in order to offer her clients more variety. She is asking for a loan from Kiva in order buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, soda, soap, and candy, products that sell very well and will help her to create more income because she will have more inventory to offer. After this she finishes paying off this loan, she means to ask for another in order to continue investing in her business. In this manner, her store will become more diverse.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, soda, soap, and candy.

loans.name: Solidaridad 2011 Group

texts.es:
La socia Emilia tiene 42 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella es natural de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. La socia Emilia es una madre emprendedora y responsable que saca adelante a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de chip para celulares móviles y además que hace pre venta de productos de una empresa privada. Desde hace varios años que se dedica a este trabajo y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Emilia requiere el préstamo para comprar más chip. 

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Solidaridad 2011” en la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está  conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Emilia is a 42-year-old member who is married and has three children. She is originally from the Province and Department of Cusco. Emilia is an enterprising and responsible mother who strives to move her family forward. She sells memory chips (SIM cards) for mobile phones, but she also makes pre-sales of products for a private company. Emilia has been working for several years at her job and is doing very well. She is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy more memory chips.

The Communal Bank “Solidaridad 2011” (Solidarity 2011) is a group in the Province and Department of Cusco that consists of friends and neighbors. These members view each moment as an opportunity to get ahead, so they strive each day to provide a better future for their children. In general, the members are grateful for the opportunity that has been given and promise to complete their payments according to the established terms.

Cusco is located in the District and Province of Cusco in the Department of Cusco. The heart of this ancient city of the Incas is where many archaeological sites are located. The historical center and the landscapes help make Cusco the most enchanting city in the southern region of Peru. Cusco is known for being a tourist and commercial area. It is also known for the traditional festival of Inti Raymi and for being the home of one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone chips (SIM cards).

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward used the previous loan to buy a motorcycle for transport business.  He is a 70-year-old married man with eight children, living in a permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. The responsibility to look after the family rests solely on him.  He still has dreams of educating his children up to the university. 

He has operated a retail shop for 20 years now, and his main constraint is inadequate capital to invest in his shop.  

Edward needs the loan to buy another motorcycle. His dream is to own a wholesale shop and to buy a motorcycle for the transport business so as to increase on his daily income. He intends to get another hired driver to ride the motorcycle, who will remit to Edward 80% of his daily earning.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle for the transport business.

loans.name: Sayda Maria

texts.es: sayda es originaria de la comarca Empalme de Boaco, de 34 años de edad, casada, tiene 1 hijo, ella es comerciante, se dedica a vender en una pulpería desde hace 3 años. Ella inicio su negocio con dinero que fue ahorrando de su trabajo anterior, entonces decidió tener en su casa una pulpería de venta de granos básicos y aceite que hasta la fecha afirma que le ha ido bien,  ha surtido más el negocio y vende otros productos. Ella trabaja sola en su negocio y a veces recibe el apoyo de su esposo económicamente cuando trabaja conduciendo un taxi. Las expectativas que tiene para su negocio es ampliarlo  con ayuda de otros préstamos para surtir más la venta. Ella esta solicitando un crédito kiva para comprar arroz, azúcar, frijol, aceite, gaseosas, jugos, condimentos para comida. Sus planes futuros es comprar una mantenedora y vender productos de refrigeración como carnes y leche. Espera que al terminar de pagar este crédito solicitara otro para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio
texts.en: Sayda is originally from the Empalme de Boaco region. She is 34 years old, married, and has 1 son. She is a merchant, and has worked selling products in a small store for three years. She started her business with money that she had saved from her previous job, so she decided to put a small store in her house that sold basic grains (rice) and oil, and she says that it has been going well thus far. She has stocked up her business and now sells other products. She works by herself in her business and sometimes receives the economic support of her spouse, who works driving a taxi. She hopes to increase the size of her business with loans in order to stock more inventory to sell. She is asking for a loan from Kiva in order to buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, soda, and condiments for food. Her plan for the future is to buy a refrigerator and sell products such as meat and milk. After paying off this loan, she means to take out another in order to continue investing in her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, soda, juice, and condiments for food.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 40-year-old married man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children to attain degrees as a minimum qualification. Robert has been farming for fifteen years. Just like most farmers, he faces the challenges of seasonal weather and high production costs. However, he has a vision of diversifying his business by including a retail shop and buying more land for farming. Robert needs a loan to buy beans, maize and carrots to plant.

loans.use: to buy beans, maize and carrots to plant.

loans.name: Modesto

texts.en: Modesto is a 53-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been in the retail business for one and a half years. Modesto started with 600,000 shillings and now has 1,500,000 shillings as working capital. His hardships are seasonal weather, inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations, inflation,and high transportation costs. Modesto's personal goals are to educate his children and to build a permanent home; his business goals are to hire employees to help expand the business and to move the business to a more permanent location. Modesto wants money to buy beers, sodas, salt and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy beers, sodas, salt and soap to sell.

loans.name: Gideon

texts.en:
Gideon is a 39-year-old married man with five children, living in Kasese, Uganda.

For ten years he has been running a a boutique.   He started with 1,500,000 shillings and now has 7,000,000 shillings as working capital. His hardships are inadequate capital to meet the different tastes and preferences, price fluctuations, and inflation. 

Gideon intends to use the money to buy clothes to sell.  His personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent home.  His business goals are buying land to grow crops and expanding business into new markets.  He also intends to diversify his business to include cloth sales.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Saturday

texts.en:
Saturday is a 25-year-old married man with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has operated two businesses for the past two years: farming and a retail shop. Saturday started with 500,000 shillings and now has 3,000,000 shillings as working capital. His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations and inflation.

Saturday's personal goals are to educate his children and to build a permanent house; his business goals are to move the business to a more permanent location and to expand his farming activities to new areas. Saturday wants money to pay workers to harvest his coffee plantation.

loans.use: to pay workers to harvest his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Zahid

texts.en: Zahid has been working as a taxi driver for 11 years. He is a hardworking and kind person. Zahid lives in the Baku Region with his family; he is an Internally Displaced Person from the town of Fuzuli, which is an occupied territory. At present, Zahid needs 1,500 AZN in order to buy spare parts to repair his car; in particular, he would like to buy a battery and a motor. Zahid is married and has two children.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his car

loans.name: Emilio

texts.en:
Emilio is a 42-year-old married man with eight children, living in Kasese, Uganda.

He sells eggs and has been in business for two years.  Since the eggs are so delicate, he sometimes loses a great many during transportation, and he desires to rent out a business premise to operate from.  He has more dreams, such as educating his children, and having a poultry project.

Emilio intends to use the loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Llapanchis Tticarisunchis Group

texts.es:
La socia Diana tiene 26 años de edad y tiene una relación de union libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella es natural de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. La socia Diana es una madre emprendedora y responsable que le gusta los retos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en una de las ferias sabatinas de la ciudad del Cusco. Desde hace varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Diana requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo ropa para niños, damas y caballeros. (La socia Diana está levantando la mano en la fotografía).

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “LLapanchis TTicarisunchis” en la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está  conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Diana is 26 years old and lives in a common-law marriage, by which she has one son. She was born in the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco. She is an enterprising mother and says that she likes the challenges. She works selling clothing in one of the Sunday markets in the city of Cusco. For many years, she has worked at this job and it has gone well for her. For this opportunity, Diana requires a loan in order to buy merchandise like clothes for children, women, and men. (Diana is the one raising her hand in the picture.)

This group is formed up neighbors and friend that form the community bank “LLapanchis TTicarisunchis” in the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco. This community bank is formed of people who are always looking for opportunities to succeed, and with their daily effort build a better future for their children. The members in general are grateful for the opportunity to get ahead and promise to pay their different loans on-time.

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco in the department of Cusco, in the heart of the ancient Inca city. It is characterized as a tourist zone because of its archaeological centers, its historic center, its scenery, its history, and the fact that it is a charming city in the south of the country. Cusco is also known for its traditional fiesta Inti Raymi and because it has one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: para comprar mercadería como ropa para niños, damas y caballeros.

loans.name: Walter

texts.en:
Walter is a 50-year-old married man. He has four children, with ages ranging from 10 years to 25 years. He describes himself to be focused man. 

He operates a tailoring retail store where he sells clothes.  He has been involved in this business for 10 years.  His business is located at a competitive business environment, and his primary customers are women.  He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. 

He will use the KES 10,000 loan to buy five rolls of clothes for making clothes for selling. His business goal is to run more tailoring retail stores within five years. 

He hopes that in the future, he will be financially independent . This is his fifth loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy five rolls of clothes materials.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a twenty four year old married man with one child.  He lives in Kasese, Uganda, and has been selling clothes for two years. With the income earned from his business he has been able to provide his family with basic necessities. Joseph says that he is challenged by unpredictable tastes and yet he always wants to be the leading supplier of trendy clothes. He is requesting a loan to buy more clothes to sell.  His personal goals are to educate his child and buy a car, while his business goals are to expand into new markets and move to a more permanent location.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Tehran

texts.en:
Tehran, 53 years old, is married and has three sons. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. Tehran breeds cows and cattle and sells milk, milk products and cattle for meat to local butchers. He has 22 years of experience in this field, thanks to his father. who taught him the best ways of looking after cattle. Tehran usually buys small cattle, raises and fattens them in 5-6 months and resells them for profit to butchers. He sells milk and yoghurt to the neighbors. Milk, yoghurt and meat are very popular products in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes such as pilau and dolma and always use yoghurt sauce. Milk products are considered to be very healthy and are used in everyday life.

Tehran's monthly income of 80 AZN from his milk and meat sales is the only source of income for his family and is not enough to cover his beloved children's basic needs. Tehran has applied for a loan of 1,100 AZN to purchase one cattle and one milking cow. This will be his second loan and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy one cattle and one milking cow

loans.name: Sanam

texts.en:
Sanam, 24 years old, is married and has two children. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. Sanam has been breeding cattle and cows for the last 3 years. She was a housewife and her husband is unemployed. 

Sanam usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months and then resells them for a profit in the livestock bazaar. Meat is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and people use it in everyday dishes such as pilau and dolma. Sanam also keeps milking cows for personal use and for selling to neighbors.  

Sanam's monthly income is 120 AZN and is the only source of income for her family. She wants to expand her business and improve her family's living conditions. She has applied for a loan of 600 AZN to purchase one milking cow.

loans.use: to buy one milking cow

loans.name: Ramil

texts.en:
Ramil is a 35-year-old married man, with one son. 

He raises fruits and vegetables in his garden, and he's been doing it for the past five years. He is a very experienced farmer and has a deep knowledge of land and how to operate it.  He was not able to find a job for several years, so he decided to start his own business.  

Ramil usually raises seasonal fruits and vegetables and sells them for a profitable price in the central bazaar. Fresh fruits and vegetables are very popular and in high demand because people prefer to eat them every day and consider them very healthy. Also one of the favorite national dishes -- dolma -- is made of fresh eggplants, peppers, and tomatoes. His monthly income from this business is 110 AZN. This is the only source of income for his family.

Now Ramil would like to invest more capital to his business and purchase seeds and fertilizers. For this purpose, he has applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN.   

He hopes this loan will improve the life of his family. This will be his second loan, and he has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Las Flores De Yanaconas Group

texts.es:
La socia Vicentina tiene 45 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella es natural de la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. La socia Vicentina es una madre emprendedora y responsable que saca adelante a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo azúcar, arroz, aceite, refrescos y granos sacos, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en la comunidad de Yanacona del distrito de Urubamba, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería  al por mayor como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, cajas de leche, cajas de fideos y otras cosas que le faltan en su negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. (La socia Vicentina está levantando la mano en la fotografía).   

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Las Flores de Yanaconas” en la provincia del Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está  conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
The group member Vicentina is 45 years old, married, and the fruit of this beautiful relationship is her three children.  She is a native of the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.  Vicentina is a responsible and enterprising mother who moves her family forward.  She works selling staple goods such as, for example, sugar, rice, oil, beverages, and grains.  She has a small grocery store in the community of Yanacona in the district of Urubamba.  At this opportunity, she is requesting a loan to purchase wholesale merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, cartons of milk, boxes of noodles and other things she is missing from her business.  It has already been several years that she has worked in this business and it is going very well.  (Vicentina is the one raising her hand in the photograph.)

This group is made up of neighbors and friends who formed the communal bank “Las Flores de Yanaconas” in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.  This communal bank is made up of people who each moment are looking for opportunities to get ahead and who strive daily to deliver a better future to their children.  The group members in general are grateful for the opportunity offered and promise to complete their different payments in the established timetables.  

Cusco is located in the full heart of the ancient city of the Incas and is characterized as being a tourist zone, for its archeological sites, its historical center, its landscapes, its history, and for being and enchanting city in the southern region of the country.  Cusco is also know for its traditional fiesta celebration of Inti Raymi and because it is near one of the seven wonders of the world: “Machupicchu”.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale merchandise such as for example, sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, cartons of milk, boxes of noodles and other things.

loans.name: Luz De Campo Group

texts.es: El banco comunal Luz de Campo esta conformado por 12 integrantes de los cuales 11 son mujeres y 1 varon todas pertenecen a la misma comunidad. las edades de los integrantes del banco esta comprendidos entre los  35 a 60 anos. las mayoria de las mujeres que conforman el banco Luz de Campo son madres de familia con 15 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. todos los integrantes  pertenecen al municipio de malpaisillo localidad de la ciudad de león. En Malpaisillo tenenos personas de condicion muy humilde, del campo las  cuales disfrutan de una vida calma, tranquila, con su rutina diario de trabajo que son 12 horas diario hasta que se oculta el sol día a día  para trabajar en sus negocios. Sus actividades económicas consisten en la elaboracion y venta de artesania , actividad muy propia de la region.  Ellas decidieron   formar el banco comunal para optar al crédito de dicha formar para salir adelante con sus actividades economicas  . Leyla Victoria es la cordinadora del banco Luz de Campo y tiene por actividad la elaboracion y venta de artesania desde hace muchos anos y siempre han demostrado su responsabilidad en sus pagos en tiempo y forma, y necesita el financiamiento para comprar materia  prima para elaborar sus diferentes artesanias como: casa de barro, jarrones, adornos de cosinas, campanas de barros, comal, floreros, jicaras, molenillos para batir pinolillo( el pinolillo es una bebida tipica de nicaragua)Los integrantes el banco Luz de campo agradece el esfuerzo y la ayuda que brindan los prestamista kiva a los pequenos comerciantes de paises pobres como es Nicaragua.
texts.en:
The communal bank Luz de Campo consists of 12 members, of whom 11 are women and 1 is a man. All are from the same community. The ages of the members of the bank are between 35 and 60 years old. The majority of the women who make up the Luz de Campo bank are mothers of families, and they are responsible for (a total of) 15 children. All the members are from the Malpaisillo township, which is part of the city of León. In Malpaisillo there are people of very humble conditions who come from the countryside. They enjoy a calm, peaceful life, with their daily work routine of 12 hour days, lasting until the sun goes down, working in their businesses. Their economic activities consist of making and selling handicrafts, an activity very typical of the region. They decided to form a communal bank so that they could opt for these loans in order to advance with their businesses.

Leyla Victoria is the coordinator of the Luz de Campo bank, and for many years her business has been making and selling handicrafts. She has always shown her responsibility in making her payments on time and correctly. She needs the loan to buy basic materials to make her various handicrafts such as clay houses, jars, kitchen decorations, clay bells, dishes, vases, bowls, and mills for grinding cornmeal (used for a typical Nicaraguan drink). 

The members of the Luz de Campo bank are grateful for the effort and the help that the Kiva lenders offer to the small business people of the poor countries such as Nicaragua.

loans.use: to buy materials to make handicrafts.

loans.name: Nadim

texts.en:
Nadim, 33 years old, is very hardworking and friendly. He is married and has two children. Nadim raises seasonal fruits and vegetables in his garden and has eight years of experience in this field. He was able to start his business with the help of AqroInvest.

Nadim usually sells his crop from his yard. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them to be healthy. Many national dishes, such as pilau and dolma, are made of vegetables. Fresh fruits are served at every Azerbaijan family's table and are also used to make fresh punch. Nadim primarily raises grapes, pears, apples, peaches and plums, as well as tomatoes, potatoes, cucumbers and carrots. His monthly income is 100 AZN.

Nadim has applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN to purchase seeds and fertilizers to increase his income. He is a trusted client of AqroInvest and this is his second loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Gulnar

texts.en:
Gulnar, 24 years old, is young, friendly and very hardworking. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with her parents in an IDP Settlement. She is a farmer who raises seasonal fruits and vegetables in her garden. She has three years of experience in this field and her father helps her to sell her crops. Gulnar usually sells her crops from her yard. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them to be healthy. Many national dishes, such as pilau and dolma, are made of vegetables. Fresh fruits are served at every Azerbaijan family's table and are also used to make fresh punch.

Gulnar's monthly income is 120 AZN. She has applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Kiad

texts.en:
Kiad is 41 years old and the father of three. He is from Bir Almaksor. Kiad has worked for years as a truck driver, transporting stock and supplies throughout the country. He decided he wanted to secure a decent income for his family and last year he invested in a street cleaning business and purchased a street-cleaning truck. Since then, the municipality has hired him as a street cleaning contractor for ten cleanings a month, which promises a strong income. He is assured a strong start to his business. Kiad continues to work as a truck drives but is working to acquire additional contracts from other cities and villages. 

Kiad is requesting a loan to complete his truck payments and begin his business. He hopes one day to be working fulltime in his own street cleaning business.

loans.use: to begin his street-cleaning business and complete payments on his cleaning truck

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is 39 years old and is married with three boys and two girls. He is from Gaza. Since 2005, he has operated a stationary store where he sells office stationary, accessories, document printing, and photocopying.

Saeed is requesting a loan through Ryada to buy more goods and change the decoration of his shop. His ambition is to provide his children with the best education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy more goods and redecorate his shop

loans.name: Los Gigantes De Santiago De Chacan Group

texts.es:
La socia Asunta tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene seis hijos, ella es natural de la provincia del Anta del departamento del Cusco. La socia Asunta es una madre emprendedora y responsable que saca adelante a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de pan y tiene un pequeño horno en su domicilio donde elabora ricos panes, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y entre otros, ella también se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería. Desde hace varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Asunta requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para su ganado como pasto, vitaminas y otros concentrados mas. (La socia Asunta está levantando la mano en la fotografía).

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Los Gigantes de Santiago” en la provincia del Anta del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está  conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (La socia que aparece en la parte inferior de la fotografia se fue antes de que se tomara la fotografia grupal). 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito, provincia y departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Asunta is 44 years old, married, and from this beautiful relationship she has six children. She is from the province of Anta, in the department of Cusco. Asunta is an enterprising mother and is responsible for her family's succees. She works selling bread and has a small oven in her house where she makes delicious bread. She also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs, among others. She also works in agriculture and livestock. For many years she has worked at this business and it is going very well for her. For this opportunity, Asunta requires a loan in order to buy food for her livestock such as grass, vitamins, and other concentrates. (Asunta is raising her hand in the photograph.)

This group was formed of neighbors and friends who form the community bank "Los Gigantes de Santiago" (The Giants of Santiago) in the province of Anta in the department of Cusco. The community bank was formed by people who look for opportunities for success in every moment and with their daily effort seek to build a better life for their children. The members in general are grateful for the opportunity it brings and promise to pay the payments on time. (The member who appears in the bottom right of the photograph left before the group photo was taken.)

Cusco is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco in the heart of the ancient Inca city. It is characterized as a tourist zone because of its archaeological centers, its historical center, its scenery, its history and for being a charming city in the southern region of the country. Cusco is also known for its traditional festival "Inti Raymi" and because it has one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: To buy food for her livestock such as grass, vitamins, and other concentrates.

loans.name: Rafiqa

texts.en:
Rafiqa is a 22-year-old single woman. She is an IDP (internally displaced person). For the past 3 years, Rafiqa has been raising fruits and vegetables in her garden. She chose this field because fresh fruits and vegetables are very popular in Azerbaijan and people like to eat them fresh and to make fresh juices, which are very healthy. 

Rafiqa's father is on a pension and helps her sell crops in the central bazaar. Raising crops and working in the open air take a lot of strength and are very hard for a woman, which is why her father helps Rafiqa. 

Rafiqa's monthly income is 120 AZN. She has applied for a loan of 1,000 AZN to buy seeds and fertilizers. This will allow her to improve the quality of her products and to increase her monthly turnover.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Waleed

texts.en:
Waleed is 56 years old and is married with three children, two of whom are in school. He is from Gaza. Waleed owns a shop where he sells home products and appliances. 

Waleed is requesting a loan through Ryada to buy shelves, an electricity generator, some furniture, and to change the decoration of his shop. He hopes his loan will help improve his income and help reach his ambition of providing his children with university educations in the future.

loans.use: to buy shelves, a generator, furniture, and to redecorate his shop

loans.name: Hahma

texts.en:
Hahma is from Israel’s Negev region. She is a second wife and has struggled under her husband’s first wife. Hahma originally only completed elementary school but through her determination she went back and earned her high school certification and has continued taking courses and furthering her knowledge. Hahma struggles economically and wanted to open a home based business, but because of the relations with her husband’s first wife, this was not possible. Slowly, slowly, Hahma opened a booth and began selling jewelry, gift items, and perfume.

She needed this loan to enlarge her business and purchase additional stock and supplies.

Hahma wants one day to make the pilgrimage and for her business to expand into selling a variety of shoes.

loans.use: To enlarge her business and purchase additional stock and supplies.

loans.name: Edward

texts.en: Edward is a twenty eight year old married man with one child living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He became a farmer after realizing how lucrative the sector was. Like most farmers his hardships are unpredictable weather conditions and price fluctuations caused by inflation. Edward is requesting a loan to buy coffee seedlings for planting. He dreams of venturing into mechanized agriculture so as to increase his yields. His personal goals are to educate his children and build a permanent house.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is a thirty four year old married man with four children in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer and has been in the agricultural sector for ten years now. His main hardships are price fluctuations and seasonal weather, which limits his profitability. Innocent has applied for a loan to plant more bananas. He has a vision of diversifying his business to include dairy farming, and of buying land to grow more crops. His personal goal is to educate his children and build a permanent house.

loans.use: to plant more bananas

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is 30 years old. He is the father of one baby, and resides in Taiz, Yemen. He strives and works hard for his family, so that he can provide them with a decent life and, above all, lots of love so that they can become better people. 

Omar is a very hard-working doctor. He works at a small medical lab. He believes things are going well for him at work because he is very kind to the customers and, above all, he is a very responsible doctor. He started to work with only one medical microscope, but he now intends to expand his lab, so he has applied for a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy another medical microscope.

loans.use: to buy another medical microscope for his lab.

loans.name: Al-Noory Group

texts.en: This group is called Al-Nory and consists of three women and three men. They live in Aden, Yemen. Noria is the leader of the group. She is the one with uncovered face in the photo. She is 56 years old, married and has nine children. She lives with them in Aden, Yemen. She sells many items in her business like perfumes, clothes, etc. She is focused on her business because this is a great help in improving her economic conditions. She has been operating this business for five years old. As time passes and her customers' needs grow, she doubles her seriousness. But seriousness and hard work aren't enough. As a result, she is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy perfumes, clothes, etc. as additional commodities to sell. She hopes to gain more profits through these goods in order to be able to provide a good living for her family.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, clothes, etc. for her business

loans.name: Sahr Group

texts.en: This group is called Sahr and consists of three women. They live in Taiz, Yemen. They took out a loan of 170,000 YER. Lebnan is 32 years old, married and has three children. She is located in the centre in the photo. She lives with them in Taiz, Yemen. She has had a house for four years. She would like to finish building her house so she applied for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB to buy building material like sand and cement for her building.

loans.use: to buy building material like sand and cement for her building.

loans.name: Fakir Group

texts.en:
This group is called Fakir, which consists of three women and one man. They have applied for a loan of 180,000 YER from AMB in order to solve their immediate financial problems. 

Zainb is the leader of this group.  A native of Taiz, Yemen, she is a 43-year-old married woman with seven children attending primary school. She has requested this loan in order to buy building materials such as sand, cement, and iron.

loans.use: to buy materials such as sand, cement, and iron for her house

loans.name: Bintang Pitoe Group

texts.en:
Lina lives in the east of Jakarta.  She is married and has two children. 

Her business is packing and shipping books. She started her business since 1987.   Nur is a loyal client because she now has entered her tenth cycle.

Sometimes she must delay shipping because of the lack of capital to buy the material for packing the books. Lina is asking a loan from Kiva Partner VisionFund Indonesia  to purchase the needed materials.   

Lina said:  "I joined this loan because the mortgage is affordable and easy process, and the manner of service of staff is also friendly and always motivating. If I did not join, perhaps until now I would still have difficulties to meet the needs of families. But I am grateful for the VisionFund Indonesia, because my business is increasing, and very helpful to my business growth.

She has a dream of having a book store and having employees.

loans.use: to buy paper, rope, rulers, boxes, and other packing materials.

loans.name: María De La Paz

texts.es:
María  tiene 26 años de edad, es soltera y tiene dos hijos. Desde pequeña trabaja en las fincas de café, inicio a los ocho años de edad. 

Ella solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 30 pliegos de lámina, cuartones, reglas para construir su casa y pago de mano de obra. El adobe ya lo tiene en la casa y el techo será de lámina. Con la inversión ella manifiesta que se realizara su mayor sueño que es tener su casa, vivir más segura junto a su familia. En un futuro desea instalar una granja de pollos y gallinas ponedoras, continuar trabajando con la Fundación Campo.
texts.en:
María, 26, is single and has two children.  She has worked on coffee farms since she was little; she began when she was eight years old.

She's requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy 30 sheets of metal, beams, and wooden frames, and to pay for labor.  She already has adobe on the house and the roof will be of metal.  She says that with the investment she will realize her biggest dream, which is to have her house and to live more securely with her family.

In the future she wants to set up a farm for chickens and laying hens, and continue working with Fundación Campo.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and to pay for labor

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: La Sra. Laura de 48 años de edad es casada y tiene 1 dependiente económico, ella es una mujer trabajadora que se ha esforzado para salir adelante, se dedica a la venta de ropa y colchonetas por catalogo. Sabe que tiene que ayudar económicamente a su familia, porque quiere que sus hijos no tengan carencia alguna es por eso que con gran esfuerzo ha ido poco a poco dándose a conocer para que su negocio crezca. En esta ocasión Laura solicita de nuestra ayuda para la compra de mercancía para hacer crecer su negocio y brindarles a sus hijos lo que ellos se merecen.
texts.en:
Laura, 48, is married and has one dependent.  She's a hardworking woman who has made the effort to get ahead.  She works selling clothing and comforters via catalogue.  She knows she has to help her family economically because she doesn't want her children to lack anything.  This is why, with great effort, she has learned little by little how to make her business grow.

Laura is requesting our help now to buy merchandise to make her business grow and to give her children what they deserve.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: El Sr. Jesús de 56 años de edad es casado y no tiene dependientes económicos. Su esposa es ama de casa y  siempre apoya a su esposo. Jesús tiene un negocio de mariscos preparados el cual ha tenido mucho éxito en la localidad ya que tiene una antigüedad de 26 años. En esta ocasión Jesús está solicitando de nuestra ayuda para invertir en su negocio ya que está creciendo debido a la gran demanda que tiene por parte de sus clientes. Agradecerá la ayuda que se brinde.
texts.en:
Jesús, 56, is married and has no economic dependents.  His wife is a housewife and always supports her husband.  Jesús has a prepared shellfish business that has been very successful in the town because it is 26 years old.

Jesús is requesting our help now to invest in his business because it's growing due to the great demand on the part of his customers.  He will be grateful for the help offered.

loans.use: to invest in his shellfish business

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: El Sr. Sergio de 40 años de edad es casado tiene dos dependientes económicos. Su esposa trabaja para el municipio desde hace muchos años ya, Sergio por su parte es despachador en una de las gasolineras de la localidad, el es un hombre trabajador que siempre busca darle lo mejor a su familia. El no quiere que sus hijos tengan carencias económicas es por eso que trabaja tan arduamente. En esta ocasión el esta solicitando de nuestra ayuda para dar mantenimiento al interior de su casa ya que sin el mantenimiento adecuado puede haber peligros de que salga moho y produzcan alguna enfermedad  y el no quiere esto para su familia. Agradecerá la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en:
Sergio is 40, married, and has two dependents. His wife has been working for the municipality for many years now. Sergio, for his part, is a delivery person for one of the local gas stations. 

He is a hard-working man who always seeks to give the best to his family. He doesn't want his children to suffer any financial privations, and that is why he works so hard.

On this occasion he is applying for help to do maintenance work to the interior of his home, as without proper maintenance there can be the danger of mold developing and causing illness. He does not want this for his family. He will be grateful for the assistance that may be offered.

loans.use: To do maintenance work to the interior of his home.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru: Ирина – трудолюбивый, пунктуальный, предприимчивый и оптимистичный предприниматель. Она любит свое дело и с удовольствием занимается торговлей: торгует мужской и женской одеждой в местном универмаге, а также имеет еще торговый отдел на Центральном рынке. Ирина недавно похоронила отца. С этим было связано много непредвиденных затрат. Кредит от КИВА понадобился Ирине для закупки женской и мужской одежды, с целью обновления ассортимента товара и пополнения оборотных средств. Ирина планировала съездить в Одессу за товаром, дополнительные средства нужны ей для того, чтобы осуществить эту поездку и привезти новый товар.
texts.en: Irina is a hard-working, punctual, active and optimistic entrepreneur. She loves her business and takes pleasure in being involved in retail: she sells men's and women's clothing at the local supermarket, and also runs a retail outlet shop at the Central market. Recently, Irina held a funeral for her father, which involved many unexpected expenses. She needs this Kiva loan to purchase women's and men's clothing in order to update the range of her merchandise and replenish her working capital. Irina has been planning to travel to Odessa to acquire these goods and needs the additional funds to finance the trip.

loans.use: to purchase men's and women's clothing

loans.name: Oleg

texts.ru: Олег торгует велосипедами и запчастями к ним. Его торговая точка расположена очень удачно. В этом бизнесе ему помогает жена. У Олега огромный выбор товара, который пользуется постоянным спросом у населения. Дополнительные средства от КИВА понадобились Олегу для того, чтобы завезти партию велосипедов из Харькова: у Олега на товар своих средств только 15 000 гривен. Кредит от КИВА нужен для того, чтобы дополнить сумму для закупки товара. Олега можно охарактеризовать как порядочного, постоянного и непроблемного бизнесмена.
texts.en: Oleg sells bicycles and their parts in a retail outlet that is very advantageously located. His wife helps him with his business. Oleg offers a huge selection of products that are in constant demand from the local populace. Presently, he needs additional funds from Kiva in order to bring in a new shipment of merchandise from Kharkov. He only has 15,000 hryvnia of his own and needs this Kiva loan to make up the full cost of the purchase. Oleg can be characterized as a respectable, steady and problem-free businessman.

loans.use: to bring in a shipment of bicycles from another city

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 8 femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé  le 15 novembre 2006. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Awa (assis sur la chaise à l’extrême droite dans la photo) est emprunteuse vedette du groupe,  âgée de 44 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfant (02 garçons).
Elle achète et revend de l’huile en détail dans sa maison où elle a une petite cantine,  une activité qu’elle fait depuis plus de 4ans.

Avec ce prêt elle compte s’approvisionner au niveau des marchés hebdomadaires pour revendre en détaille dans son village et les villages environnants.
-	Pour une somme de 130 000F Cfa de marchandise (bidons huile de 20 litres) il lui faudra 10 jours en moyenne pour l’écouler.
Au bout des 10 jours Elle se retrouve souvent avec un bénéfice net de 7 000F Cfa après déduction de toutes ses charges.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront d’épargner et de prendre en charge une partie de la  scolarité de ses enfants et de soutenir son marie dans la maison.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 8 women who are very active in the “banc villageois” created on November 15, 2006. They all come from the same village and get along very well. Their main activity is small-scale retail.

Mrs. Awa (seated on the chair on the far right of the photo) is the star borrower of the group. She is 44 years old, married and the mother of two children (two boys). She buys and retails oil from her house where she has a small cafeteria, an activity she has been conducting for over 4 years.

With this loan, she is planning on getting her supplies from the weekly markets to resell in her village and the surrounding ones.
With 130 000 Francs CFA worth of merchandise (20 liter oil drums) it takes her about 10 days to exhaust her stock. After 10 days, she will often end up with a net profit of 7,000 francs CFA after deducting all her expenses.

The profit from her activity will allow her to save and to cover part of her children’s school fees and support her husband at home.

loans.use: purchase oil wholesale to retail from her home where she has a small cafeteria.

loans.name: Ma De Los Angeles

texts.es: La Sra. Ma de Los Angeles de 51 años de edad es casada, ella es una mujer trabajadora que se ha esforzado para salir adelante, ella se dedica a la venta de chicharrones. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y ambos se dan apoyo para solventar los gastos de la familia. En esta ocasión Ma de los Angeles  solicita de nuestra ayuda para la compra de mercancía para hacer crecer su negocio y brindarles a sus clientes variedad. Ella agradecerá la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en:
Ma de Los Angeles is 51 years old and married. She is a hard-working woman who has done her best to succeed in life. She sells fried pork rinds. 

Her husband farms, and both help one another in paying the family's expenses.

On this occasion, Ma de los Angeles is requesting help to buy merchandise to make her business grow and offer variety to her customers. She will be grateful for the assistance that may be offered.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Sounkarou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 21 femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé  le 15 novembre 2006. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Sounkar (assis sur la chaise à l’extrême droite dans la photo) est emprunteuse vedette du groupe,  âgée de 36 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfant (02 filles et 01 garçon).
Elle achète et revend de la patte d’arachide dans sa maison où elle a une petite cantine,  une activité qu’elle fait depuis plus de 2 ans.

Avec ce prêt elle compte s’approvisionner au niveau des marchés hebdomadaires pour revendre en détaille dans son village et les villages environnants.
-	Pour une somme de 185 000F Cfa de marchandise (seaux patte d’arachide, sac de sucre) il lui faudra 02 semaines en moyenne pour l’écouler.

Elle se retrouve souvent avec un bénéfice net de 24 000F Cfa/15 jours après déduction de toutes ses charges.
Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront d’épargner et de prendre en charge une partie de la  scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 21 women, all very active in the “banc villageois” created on November 15, 2006. They all come from the same village and get along very well. Their main activity is small-scale retail.

Mrs. Sounkar (seated on the chair on the far right of the photo) is the star borrower of the group. She is 36 years old, married and the mother of three children (2 girls and 1 boy). She buys and retails peanut paste from her house where she has a small cafeteria, an activity she has been conducting for over 2 years.

With this loan, she is planning on getting her supplies from the weekly markets to resell in her village and the surrounding ones.

With 185,000 Francs CFA worth of merchandise (buckets of peanut paste, bags of sugar) it takes her about two weeks to exhaust her stock. She often ends up, 15 days later, with a net profit of 24,000 francs CFA after deducting all her expenses.

The profit from her activity will allow her to save and to cover part of her children’s school fees.

loans.use: purchase peanut paste and sugar that she will resell at her cafeteria.

loans.name: Malohatkhon

texts.ru: Малохатхону 22 года. Она хорошая девушка с приятным внешним видом, которая имеет великолепный талант. Она поет как соловей и является студенткой 5 курса Таджикского Национального Университета. Малохатхон учится на хорошие оценки и ее преподаватели довольны ею. По специальности она эстрадная певица и будущим она хочет стать известной певицей. Ее родители не в состоянии в этом году оплатить за ее учебу в университете и Малохатхон надеется только на вас. Она запрашивает кредит для оплаты учебы в университете. Малохатхон ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Malohatkhon is 22 years old. She is a nice young woman with a pleasing appearance, and has a wonderful talent. Malohatkhon has a beautiful singing voice and is currently a fifth-year student at the Tajik National University. She gets good grades, and her professors are happy with her. Malohatkhon is studying to be a singer and wants to be famous in the future.

This year, Malohatkhon's parents are unable to pay her tuition and you are her only hope. She is requesting this loan to pay for her university education and is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her university studies

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto,  está acompañado, tiene un niño de dos años, trabaja en el cultivo de granos Básicos para obtener ingresos y mantener a su familia, el trabaja desde pequeño en esta área ya que sus padres se dedicaban a la agricultura, él lo aprendió y hoy en día se independizo  trabajando propio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo  para invertirlo en la compra de cinco sacos de abono, el cual le ayudaran a realizar una alta producción y aumentar sus ingresos. Sus aspiraciones con respecto al préstamo es crecer económicamente para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia
texts.en:
Roberto is in a common-law marriage and has a two year-old son. His work is growing basic grains, which he does to earn income and take care of his family. He has been working in this area since he was young because his parents worked in agriculture and he learned it from them. Today he is independent and working on his own.

He has requested a loan to invest in the purchase of five sacks of fertilizer, which will help him to achieve high production and to increase his income. His dream with respect to this loan is to grow economically in order to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy five sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Mauro

texts.es:
Mauro, necesita comprase un expansor para ampliar y remodelar vehículos que hayan sido chocados, esta compra le dará los beneficios necesarios para prestar un buen servicio, el expansor será de ocho toneladas, con la herramienta podra moldear, este préstamo le ayudara con los recursos económicos para solventar la necesidad en el taller.
Con el préstamo anterior logro reparar la maquinaria, permitiéndole estar en buenas condiciones para poder mejorar el servicio a los clientes, los ingresos han sido permanentes, su calidad de vida considera que esta progresando.
texts.en:
Mauro needs to buy himself an expander to widen and remodel vehicles that have been damaged.  This purchase will give him the necessary profit to give good service.  It will be an eight-ton expander.  With this tool he'll be able to mold.

This loan will help him with the economic resources to pay for his need in the shop.

With the previous loan he managed to repair the machinery, allowing it to be in good condition to be able to better serve his customers.  The income has been constant.  He thinks his quality of life is improving.

loans.use: to buy an expander for his shop

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, se dedica crianza de cerdos y a la producción agrícola pero no cuenta con el capital para poder aumentar su producción, es por ello que tomo a bien  solicitar un préstamo  por la necesidad de invertir en su cultivo. Manifiesta que el préstamo será  destinado para  compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, insecticidas  y herbicida. 
Expresa que el crédito anterior cubrió muchas necesidades, en especial la compra de cerdos, en su familia y poder tener todo lo necesario para trabajar y que ha cambiado su modelo de vida, las circunstancia familiares, ingresos más altos.
texts.en:
Manuel dedicates himself to raising pigs and to agricultural production but he does not have the capital to be able to increase his production. This is why he thought it would be good to request a loan to meet his need to invest in his crops. This loan will be used to buy agricultural materials like fertilizers, insecticides, and herbicide

Manuel says that his last loan covered many necessities, especially the purchase of pigs. It has made it possible for his family to have everything they need to work, has changed their lifestyle and circumstances, and increased their income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and herbicide

loans.name: Rosa Dilma

texts.es:
Rosa, tiene 41 años de edad, casada, vive en una aldea de Omoa, Cortes, junto a su esposo y dos hijos uno de 9 y  21 años de edad. Los dos hijos están estudiando actualmente. Ella  es una persona cristiana, y bien conocida en la aldea, trabajadora y dedicada a su negocio. Hace 4 años que se dedica a generar sus propios ingresos con la venta de mercadería, como Ropa americana para damas y caballeros y también zapatos. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante o a domicilio por pedidos. Su esposo recibe ingresos de su trabajo como jardinero en una propiedad privada. Agradece a ODEF y a Kiva por el apoyo brindado, con el préstamo anterior se ayudo a tener una estabilidad económica en el negocio y un crecimiento en clientes.
Con este segundo préstamo que solicita de 10,000 lempiras, va surtir más de ropa y calzado para mantener estable el negocio y aumentar las ventas. Su meta es trabajar duro para dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y hacer crecer el negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa is 41 years old, married, and lives in a neighborhood of Omoa, Cortes, with her husband and two children (ages 9 and 21). Her two children are currently studying. Rosa is a Christian woman who is well-known in the neighborhood for being hardworking and dedicated to her business. For the past four years, she has been generating her own income by selling merchandise such as American clothing for women and men, as well as shoes. Her sales are conducted as a traveling merchant or by taking orders at her home. Rosa’s husband earns income from his job as a gardener at a private property.

She is grateful to ODEF and Kiva for the support that has been provided. With the help of her previous loan, Rosa was able to achieve financial stability in her business and growth in the number of customers. With this second loan of 10,000 HNL that she requested, Rosa will restock with more clothing and shoes so that she can maintain a stable business and increase her sales. Her goal is to work hard so that she can provide a better quality of life for her family and grow her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To renovate the poultry house and cow stalls.

loans.name: Ruwa

texts.en: Ruwa lives in Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya. He is married and has four children. He owns a hawking business and sells livestock, a business he has been operating for six years now.  He learned about Milango through a friend who invited him to the group and he joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve on his business operations. His main challenge is high transport and fuel prices from the farm to the market place. Ruwa is applying a loan of 21,100 Kenyan shillings to buy goats and cows to sell. His extra income will be added to his savings to pay school fees for his children. He aspires to expand and become a large scale dealer in the livestock selling business.

loans.use: To buy goats and cows to sell.

loans.name: Samini

texts.en: Samini lives in Likoni area of Coast Province, Kenya. He is married and has three children. He owns a green grocery that he has been operating for three years. He learned about Milango through friends who invited him to the group; he joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve his business operations. His main challenges are price fluctuation, inflation, high fuel and transport costs. Samini is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenyan shillings to purchase grocery stock. His extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to expand the business into a boutique. His dream is to see his business grow to a wholesale and start another grocery.

loans.use: To purchase grocery stock.

loans.name: Mwachipanga

texts.en: Mwachipanga lives in Mariakani area of Coast Province, Kenya. He is single, but has two children. He owns a cafe, a business that he has been operating for ten years. He started the business through his personal savings. He learned about Milango through friends who invited him to the group. He joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve his business operations. His main challenge is price fluctuations and inflation. Mwachipanga is applying for a loan of 15,850 Kenyan shillings to buy cooking oil and potatoes in wholesale. The extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to increase it. His future plan is to buy a plot of land and build a business mall.

loans.use: To purchase cooking oil and potatoes in wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fishing equipment, bait fish, and snacks.

loans.name: Nahida

texts.en:
Nahida is 41 years old and married woman with two children. She is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP) and lives with her family in the IDP Settlement.  Nahida is a widow; she lost her husband during the war and raises her two children alone. She is a farmer raising seasonal fruits and vegetables. She has eight years of experience, which makes her an experienced and skilled person in this field. 

Nahida usually sells her crops from her house. People use fresh vegetables everyday and consider them healthy. Many national dishes are made from vegetables, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are served on every table in Azerbaijan families and are also used to make fresh punch. Her monthly income is 70 AZN. Raising crops is taking a lot of strength. Working in the open air is very hard for a woman and that why her son helps. 

She needs additional capital to invest in buying seeds and fertilizers as well as new garden tools. This will allow her to improve the quality of the products she raises and increase monthly turnover.  For this purpose she applied for 1,000 AZN loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Esmer

texts.en:
Esmer is a very friendly and smiling person. She is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) and lives in the IDP Settlement with her father. She is a widow. She lost her husband during the war; since then, she gave her word that she will never marry again. She is a farmer raising seasonal fruits and vegetables. She has more than seven years of experience, which makes her an experienced and skilled person in this field. 

Esmer usually sells her crops in the central bazaar. People use fresh vegetables everyday and consider them healthy. Many national dishes made from vegetables, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are served on every table in Azerbaijan families and are also used to make fresh punch. Her monthly income is 50 AZN. Raising crops is takes a lot of strength, She is working in the open air, which is very hard for a woman and that why her father helps her.  

She needs additional capital to invest in buying seeds and fertilizers. This will allow her to improve quality of the products she raises and increase monthly turnover. For this purpose she applied for a 1,000 AZN loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Aytekin

texts.en:
Aytekin is a 44-year-old woman; she is married with three children. She is a nurse and works in the local hospital. However, her primary business is perfumery and jewellery. She decided to start this business 10 years ago when she understood that her salary as a nurse is not enough to cover the family's needs. Aytekin`s business brings her stable income of 120 AZN.

She sells her goods from her house. It is safe and popular among the neighboring women, who often come to her place to choose something from her products. Now she would like to increase her income and purchase more perfumery and jewellery as they are very popular. She applied for 1,500 AZN to purchase more merchandise and increase her sales. This will be her second loan; she has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Arkinaz

texts.en: Arkinaz is married and has two children. She loves her family very much. She is 41 years old. She needs 2,000 AZN (Azerbaijani New Manat) to buy calves to improve her business. She has been raising farm animals for the last eight years. She tries all the time to improve her monthly income in order to support her family. Arkinaz lives in the Fuzuli region with her husband and children. Arkinaz is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from the city of Fuzuli.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Dienaba's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 5 femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé  le 15 novembre 2006. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Diénaba (assis sur la chaise à l’extrême droite dans la photo) est emprunteuse vedette du groupe,  âgée de 49 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfant (02 garçons et 1 fille).
Elle achète et revend de l’arachide en graine,  une activité qu’elle fait depuis plus de 2 ans.

Avec ce prêt elle compte s’approvisionner au niveau des marchés hebdomadaires pour revendre en détaille dans son village et les villages environnants.
-	Pour une somme de 400 000F Cfa de marchandise (sac de 50kg) il lui faudra 30 jours en moyenne pour les écouler.
Au bout des 30 jours Elle se retrouve souvent avec un bénéfice net de 35 000F Cfa après déduction de toutes ses charges.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront d’épargner et de prendre en charge une partie de la  scolarité de ses enfants et de soutenir son marie dans la maison.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of 5 women who are very active in the banc villageois created on November 15, 2006. They all come from the same village and all get along well. Their primary activity is small business. 

Madame Diénaba (seated on the chair at right) is the lead borrower of the group. She is 49, married, and has three children (two boys and a girl). For more than two years, she has been buying and reselling peanuts. 

She will use the loan to buy supplies at the weekly markets. She will then resell for retail in her village and in neighboring villages. It takes her 30 days on average to sell 400 000 F CFA worth of goods (bag of 50kg).

After 30 days, she often finds herself with a net profit of 35000 F CFA after all her expenses have been taken out. 

The income from her business will allow her to save money, pay for a portion of her children's schooling, and support her husband at home.

loans.use: to buy supplies (peanuts) that she can resell for retail in her village and in neighboring villages.

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen is 42 years old and has five children. Aileen is married and has two children in school. She is in the agricultural business doing pig fattening in the Philippines. Aileen requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. She has been pig fattening business for nine years now, and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Aileen would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos  para la venta, pero para ello necesita un financiamiento, tomo la decisión de sacar un préstamo lo cual lo necesita para invertirlo en la producción, para comprar semilla de maíz, tambien comprar seis sacos de abono y una bolsa de herbicida granulado.
Ella dice que con el anterior préstamo aumento la productividad de maíz y aumento sus ingresos por ende su rentabilidad .Todo esto gracias al crédito de Kiva que recibió y no tiene ningún problema que les afecte por este momento.
texts.en: Irma grows and sells staple grains for a living but for this she needs financing.
